general_info.summary: This text outlines various programs, schools, reports, and initiatives at Sharda University for the 2025-26 academic year. It includes details on academic offerings like the School of Dental Sciences and School of Nursing Science & Research, administrative documents such as Examination Annual Reports and University Brochures, and various student-focused activities including skill enhancement, entrepreneurship, and international credit transfer programs. The content also touches upon university structure, history, tenders, COVID-19 updates, and important guidelines for students.
